p: In conclusion, this study demonstrates that Mentha × piperita EO downregulated C. albicans growth and transition, resulting in a decrease in biofilm formation and a disruption of mature biofilm. The effects of Menth × piperita EO may occur through the modulation of certain C. albicans genes. Overall results clearly confirm the potential of Menth × piperita EO as an antifungal molecule.
